TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Conversation extends Microsoft.Lync.Model.Internal.UCWFull

Docs.summary: Describes a conversation. It includes details such as the conversation participants, modalities (InstantMessaging, AudioVideo), state, etc., and implements actions such as merge, park, terminate or other conversation actions.
